author: RSalvatico
body:
#### PR description:

This is a draft PR with changes in the EGM code to allow HCAL PF cuts to be taken from DB on demand (i.e., for specific workflows) in alternative to being taken from config files (as discussed [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1220970/contributions/5284605/attachments/2598482/4486203/HCAL_PFlowCutsSeeds_Feb24_2023.pdf)).

Lots of adaptation work was done already on the PF side and in several aspects this should be similar.
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43025

No validation has been done yet - still need some work before testing. The changes applied to GEDPhotonProducer and PhotonProducer in terms of reading the DB cuts and parse them to the hcalESum functions likely need to be applied to GsfElectronAlgo, ConversionTrackCandidateProducer and ConvertedPhotonProducer in a very similar way.
title: Change EGM code to be able to read HCAL PF thresholds from DB
